    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:b031e0d1-a8f8-49c6-9804-5a398172df0f</entry>

            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>b031e0d1-a8f8-49c6-9804-5a398172df0f</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A növények országa</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Plant Kingdom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Pflanzenreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Royaume d'Usine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Reino De Planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Regno Di Pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βασίλειο εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Reino De Planta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A növények országának rövid jellemzése, a növények törzsei (zöldmoszatok, vörösmoszatok, barnamoszatok, mohák, zuzmók, harasztok, nyitvatermők, zárvatermők)</string>
            <string language="en-US">Describing the Kingdom of Plants, Phyla of Plants (Green Algae, Red Algae, Brown Algae, Bryophyte, Lichen, Ferns, Gymnosperms, Angiosperms)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">rendszerezés</string>
            <string language="en-US">systematization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">rendszertan</string>
            <string language="en-US">taxonomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">növények</string>
            <string language="en-US">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreiben des Königreiches der Betriebe, Phyla
der Betriebe (grüne Algen, rote Algen, braune Algen, Bryophyte, 
Flechte, Farne, Gymnospermen, Angiospermen)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrire le royaume des usines, Phyla des usines 
(algues vertes, algues rouges, algues brunes, Bryophyte, lichen, 
fougères, gymnospermes, angiospermes)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrevendo o reino das plantas, Phyla das plantas
(algas verdes, algas vermelhas, algas marrons, Bryophyte, lichen, 
ferns, gymnosperms, angiosperms)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione del regno delle piante, Phyla delle 
piante (alghe verdi, alghe rosse, alghe brune, Bryophyte, lichene, 
ferns, gimnosperme, angiosperme)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή του βασίλειου των εγκαταστάσεων, Phyla των
εγκαταστάσεων (πράσινα άλγη, κόκκινα άλγη, καφετιά άλγη, 
Bryophyte, λειχήνα, φτέρες, gymnosperms, angiosperms)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Describir el reino de plantas, Phyla de las 
plantas (algas verdes, algas rojas, algas marrones, Bryophyte, liquen,
ferns, gimnospermas, angioespermas)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Systematisierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Taxonomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systématisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">taxonomie</string>
          </keyword>
